DPRK Ambassador to Britain Appointed
   Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Ja Song Nam was appointed as the DPRK ambassador to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.
